name: Harry Potter
subject: Do you want to go to Hogwarts?
message: Hi, just writing to ask if you wanted to go to Hogwarts? theres a spot for you...

name: Ron Weasley
subject: Can I go to hogwarts?
message: I think Harry messaged you about going to Hogwarts. If its cool wit you, can I go instead of you??? thanks :)

name: Harry Potter
subject: Don't allow anyone to use your invite!
message: If anyone has asked you to use your invitation to come to Hogwarts you are not permitted to give it to them. They will not be allowed to enter using your invite so it would be pointless anyway!
